meanings.definition: A person with whom one shares a secret or private matter.
meanings.sent1: My two best friends are my confidantes.
meanings.sent2: She trusted her confidantes with her deepest thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The confidantes giggled as they shared the secret cookie stash.
meanings.sent4: In the world of spies, confidantes are like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The confidantes whispered in the shadows, their bond unbreakable.
